name: Crossovers by POWGI
description:
These little crossword puzzles only have one letter missing. Once you've found the missing letters, rearrange them to solve the cryptic clue!

Crossovers by POWGI contains dozens of puzzles, in a slick, easy-to-use app. POWGI's no-fluff approach puts the focus firmly on the puzzle content.

Please email support@powgi.com if you need assistance. POWGI has excellent support and we'd rather help you than get a bad review.
